mapper.select: SELECT treatment_no AS treatmentNo ,treatment_department AS treatmentDepartment ,hospital_name AS hospitalName ,treatment_title AS treatmentTitle ,doctor_name AS treatmentContent ,treatment_date AS treatmentDate FROM treatment WHERE member_no = #{memberNo} ORDER BY treatment_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{pagePerRow}

SELECT treatment_no AS treatmentNo ,treatment_department AS treatmentDepartment ,hospital_name AS hospitalName ,treatment_title AS treatmentTitle ,treatment_content AS treatmentContent ,doctor_name AS doctorName ,hospital_address AS hospitalAddress ,treatment_date AS treatmentDate FROM treatment WHERE treatment_no = #{treatmentNo}

SELECT treatment_file_no AS treatmentFileNo ,treatment_file_name AS treatmentFileName ,treatment_file_real_name AS treatmentFileRealName ,treatment_file_size AS treatmentFileSize ,treatment_file_ext AS treatmentFileExt FROM treatment_file WHERE treatment_no = #{treatmentNo}

(SELECT treatment_no AS TreatmentNo FROM treatment WHERE treatment_date > #{treatmentDate} LIMIT 1) UNION ALL (SELECT treatment_no AS TreatmentNo FROM treatment WHERE treatment_date < #{treatmentDate} ORDER BY treatment_date DESC LIMIT 1)
